group_1.textRight: I should ask Rabitan where she's at,@right?
...Are you two still not getting along...?
You're making it hard for Mii to come play,@so hurry and make up.

group_1.textCenter: Now then...
(When Rabi spoke to me previously about@how she met Papa...)
(She mentioned she was involved in some@serious problem with her hometown,)
(and said Papa had saved her...)
(She never went into detail about@what the problem was,)
(but if it is a relationship problem...)
(If I read the letter again with that in mind...)

group_1.narration: I finally found you, Rabi Himuro.@I never imagined you would be@a servant at a place like this.
Seems like your annoying roommate@is pretty busy, too.@You're not getting away.
Let's meet, just the two of us.@I'll be waiting at the place@this evening.
And if you don't come...@Well, I don't need to write@that part down, do I?

group_1.textCenter: (The sender of this letter must be the one@causing Rabi's problem,)
(and came to get revenge on her while Papa@is away...is how I could read this now.)
It is possible...
(But if the "roommate" is me,)
(how would they know that I was busy today...)
[chara:103701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Don't tell me...

group_1.textRight: I don't sense any magic power around...@...Just my imagination...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, nah, just felt like something@might've been watching me...

group_1.textCenter: (That something that she felt watching her@must have been whoever sent this letter...)
(This person knew that both Rabi and that I,@the "annoying roommate," were separated,)
(and came to the house to be alone with Rabi,)
(but the target, Rabi, is out of town.)
(And so, expecting Rabi to return home@around noon,)
(they hastily wrote this letter to request@a meeting this evening...)

group_1.narration: And if you don't come...@Well, I don't need to write@that part down, do I?

group_1.textCenter: (If she doesn't come, that means they are@threatening to attack our home.)
(To not get me involved,@Rabi must have accepted,)
(meaning they are lying in wait to take@revenge on Rabi...!)
A cowardly crime is about to happen!
Ah, Mikage!

group_1.textLeft: Did you find out where Rabi is?!
Eh... W-why do you want to...?

group_1.textRight: Because you sound like you're in a hurry, so I'm@wondering if something happened to Rabitan.
This isn't your normal mood.@Even I can tell that.
See! Something really did happen,@didn't it?!
I don't like this - what if something@happens to you both?!

group_1.textLeft: ...I understand. You are a good girl,@Mikage.
I would like you to come with me!
